inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: HCV 2 years ago and recent coinfection with HBV

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: willingness to allow study staff to review your medical records between research visits

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: willing to have samples stored for future research

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: positive Hepatitis B surface antigen within the past 12 months or HBV DNA positive

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: positive HCV antibody and/or positive HCV RNA test (HCV RNA of 2,000 IU/mL or greater)

exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: alert male with no acute distress

notes: The patient has a history of HCV and recent coinfection with HBV. He is on IFN, RBV and direct antiviral drugs for the past 6 months.
